Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

The Ladies answered Blaze's question:

Aelo: You're in BlackFortress...
Celeno: That's Dragon's and Predacon's Territory...
Ocipite: And your friend's in hot waters...

Dakfat appeared and aimed his weapon. "To all my troops..." said the 
Dragon "I need all strong bots in quarters's area and... NOW!!!!!"

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: In very hot waters...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest watches his EMP shots do their job as Bullet collapses on 
> the floor. He silently watches another bot come up and bite at his 
> neck, but that wasn't his concern.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Bullet ducked the first pulse, slowed so the second missed, slid 
> under the
> > third and just when the bulls horns were ready to run through 
> Drillbit the
> > fourth pulse struck Bullet sending him sliding backward into a 
> wall. Again
> > he raised to his feat, stomping, snorting, and groaning. He 
ducked 
> his head
> > to charge, took about a dozen steps and collapsed, the EMP over 
> taking his
> > system.
> > 
> > Blaze transformed back to robot mode staring down at 
> Bullet. "That's what
> > you get you dumb ox." she turned back to Hellbeast and 
Drillbit, "I 
> am so
> > sorry about my stupid friend here." By the way, where are we 
> anyways?" She
> > knew better, more subtle ways of gathering information.
